title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with grated cheese.
Drain pasta and combine with bacon.
Remove from heat and stir in egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Stir in cream and serve hot.
